Classes/Realm/Configuration.html#/s:vVC1.name: fileURL

Classes/Realm/Configuration.html#/s:vVC1.abstract: A string used to identify a particular in-memory Realm. Mutually exclusive with path.

Classes/Realm/Configuration.html#/s:vVC1.abstract: A 64-byte key to use to encrypt the data, or nil if encryption is not enabled.

Classes/Realm/Configuration.html#/s:vVC1.name: deleteRealmIfMigrationNeeded

Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.name: beginWrite()
Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.abstract: Begins a write transaction on the Realm.

Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.name: commitWrite()
Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.abstract: Commits all write operations in the current write transaction, and ends the transaction.

Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.name: cancelWrite()
Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.abstract: Reverts all writes made in the current write transaction and ends the transaction.

Classes/Realm.html#/s:vC10RealmSwift5Rea.name: inWriteTransaction

Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.name: delete(_:)

Classes/Realm.html#/s:FC10RealmSwift5Rea.abstract: Invalidates all Objects and Results managed by the Realm.

Classes/List.html.name: List
Classes/List.html.abstract: List is the container type in Realm used to define to-many relationships.

Classes/Migration.html.abstract: Migration instances encapsulate information intended to facilitate a schema migration.

Classes/Object.html.abstract: Object is a class used to define Realm model objects.

Classes/ObjectSchema.html.abstract: This class represents Realm model object schemas.

Classes/Realm.html.name: Realm
Classes/Realm.html.abstract: A Realm instance (also referred to as a Realm) represents a Realm database.

Classes/Results.html.name: Results
Classes/Results.html.abstract: Results is an auto-updating container type in Realm returned from object queries.

Classes/Schema.html.name: Schema
Classes/Schema.html.abstract: Schema instances represent collections of model object schemas persisted to a Realm.
